mixed-citation.article-title: Morphology and Taxonomy of Isopoda Anthuroidea (Crustacea) from Sulawesi with description of six new species

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Expanathura amstelodami (Kensley, 1976)
. There are 6 described species that have been assigned to this genus. These occur only in Indo-Pacific reef areas and Madagascar , typically in shallow water (rarely deeper than 10 m ).
